title: One Piece: Kizamareru Rekishi! Gekidou no Shinkyuu Yonkou!
content:
Is this even a recap? I mean, in a sense, it does revisit several points from the story, but on the other hands, non of them are chronologically ordered. More like an informative profile on all new and old emperors.

At least it gets points for being different, with mini Zoro and Brook being narrators.

With Whitebeard, Kaido, Big Mom, Shanks, Blackbeard, Luffy, and Buggy being all emperors of the past and present, it’s while 7 characters have had that title so far, and only one of them hasn’t been replaced yet. With what it seems like it, it feels that Shanks will be taken out byBlackbeard, but so far, all past emperors were taken out by non-emperor characters and got replaced by bystanders, it would be weird to have Shanks be the outlier.
